name: masked-input
description: Set of input tools for formatting

scripts.hard-rebuild-all: cd input-core; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install; npm run build; cd ../react-maskinput; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install; npm run build; cd ../react-numberinput; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install; npm run build; cd ../mask-input; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install; npm run build; cd ../; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install; npm run build-example

author: Nikita Mostovoy <nik.mostovoy@gmail.com> (http://xnim.ru)
